item.title: No title
item.description: My name is Steven. I am an American from the sunny State of Florida. I have been living in South Korea since October of 2007. I am a happily married man of six years to my beautiful and wonderful Korean wife. We live in the Seoul-Ilsan area. I really enjoy living here in Korea. I enjoy springtime the most because it is so beautiful. I have a passion for teaching. I enjoy photography, swimming, Wing Chun Kung Fu, and nature.Â
